definition: all smiles/beaming from ear to ear
lit. with a face full of dust/showing the hardships of travel (idiom)

sentences.english: Saw manager the whole face is not happy, we gingerly, cautious.
sentences.chinese: 看到經理滿臉不高興，我們戰戰兢兢，如履薄冰。

sentences.english: Jiang dipped and danced, delighting her teammates and the arena.
sentences.chinese: 江鈺源輕輕的飛舞，隊員們和現場觀衆滿臉堆笑。

sentences.english: When he saw me, he took off his hat with an air of gorgeous servility .
sentences.chinese: 他看到我，脫掉帽子，滿臉都是阿諛的神色。
你這個滿臉鼻涕的老頭子。

sentences.english: Most would just stand there and play with grim looks on their faces.
sentences.chinese: 他們中多數都只是站在那，滿臉陰氣。

sentences.english: When she heard this, she got red with anger.
sentences.chinese: 皇后聽到這些話時，氣得滿臉通紅。

sentences.english: In addition to vomit your face emerge spittle, you Mandehuaya play.
sentences.chinese: 除了吐你們滿臉滿身唾沫，還打得你們滿地找牙。

sentences.english: These graduates who are freshly out of school still show childishness on their faces.
sentences.chinese: 這些剛走出校門的學生仍是滿臉稚氣。

sentences.english: Tom said to his boss, with a smile on his face.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆滿臉堆笑地向老闆打招呼。

sentences.english: How dare such a hairy-faced thing speak rudely to him!
sentences.chinese: 這樣滿臉鬍子的東西，也敢出言無狀麼？

sentences.english: The men are heavily bearded and everyone has long hair.
sentences.chinese: 男人們滿臉鬍鬚，人人都是留着一頭長髮。

sentences.english: Wolves have smiles on three little pigs to please go outing.
sentences.chinese: 野狼只好滿臉堆笑地請三隻小豬一起去郊遊。

sentences.english: His entire face beamed with happiness.
Asked the marquis , remarking the cloud on villefort s brow.
sentences.chinese: 侯爵問，他已經注意到維爾福滿臉愁雲。

sentences.english: I only know two sorts of boys. Mealy boys, and beef-faced boys.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道兩種男孩，臉色蒼白和滿臉都是橫肉的。
